post.title: Why is this guild quarantined?

body:
Legit no one is asking for this too.

The only thing the left has asked for here is to be able to have more control over our own guilds through comment moderation, not for other guilds to be censored.
body_html:
Legit no one is asking for this too.

The only thing the left has asked for here is to be able to have more control over our own guilds through comment moderation, not for other guilds to be censored.

post.title: Why is this guild quarantined?

body:
I didn't even know Ruqqus had a quarantine function. Weird.

If they're going to follow the reddit style of "if a guild is not moderated properly, it will be quarantined/banned/put on hold until proper moderation" they ought be transparent about it
body_html:
I didn't even know Ruqqus had a quarantine function. Weird.

If they're going to follow the reddit style of "if a guild is not moderated properly, it will be quarantined/banned/put on hold until proper moderation" they ought be transparent about it

body:
There is no quarantine function. The guild was set to private before the GM leaving.

Private guilds have their previously posted content made public.

post.title: Why is this guild quarantined?

body:
If a guild owner decides to private their guild, it's up to them, not the Ruqqus staff. At least that's what it seems like. 

>Private guilds have their previously posted content made public.

This is a step up from Reddit if anything, in regards to how privating a subreddit works over there.
body_html:
If a guild owner decides to private their guild, it's up to them, not the Ruqqus staff. At least that's what it seems like.

Private guilds have their previously posted content made public.

This is a step up from Reddit if anything, in regards to how privating a subreddit works over there.

post.title: Why is this guild quarantined?

body:
Ruqqus doesn't have a quarantine function. 

Frankly, that guild looks like a setup. It's filled with nothing but Nazi crap. I wouldn't put it past the trolls to set ruqqus up with some hate-filled guild. Then whip the mob up into a frenzy and have them go after Ruqqus's hosting company forcing them to drop Ruqqus. They've done that to several companies. It is part of their playbook.
body_html:
Ruqqus doesn't have a quarantine function.

Frankly, that guild looks like a setup. It's filled with nothing but Nazi crap. I wouldn't put it past the trolls to set ruqqus up with some hate-filled guild. Then whip the mob up into a frenzy and have them go after Ruqqus's hosting company forcing them to drop Ruqqus. They've done that to several companies. It is part of their playbook.

body: And banning. I don't how a sub "breaking" the rules at the very end warrants its entire history being deleted, sometimes 11+ years worth of content. Looks like the admins are very concerned about hiding what the subs they banned were actually like.

parent.body:
Ruqqus doesn't have a quarantine function. 

Frankly, that guild looks like a setup. It's filled with nothing but Nazi crap. I wouldn't put it past the trolls to set ruqqus up with some hate-filled guild. Then whip the mob up into a frenzy and have them go after Ruqqus's hosting company forcing them to drop Ruqqus. They've done that to several companies. It is part of their playbook.
parent.body_html:
Ruqqus doesn't have a quarantine function.

Then whip the mob up into a frenzy and have them go after Ruqqus's hosting company forcing them to drop Ruqqus. They've done that to several companies. It is part of their playbook.

parent.body:
There is no quarantine function. The guild was set to private before the GM leaving.

Private guilds have their previously posted content made public.
